title: Local investigative reporting will make money again
description: Everyone knows the eulogy: Information deserts. Hollowed newsrooms. “Benevolent” billionaire owners. Fickle non-profit donors. All leading to the ceaseless shuttering of local and regional newsrooms across the country. And it’s true. In many ways, local investigative journalism — the kind that takes time, costs money, has uncertain outcomes, and can truly make an impact —...
